questionTitle: You can stay here ........ you keep silent.
Doctors have proved that air pollution causes ..................... diseases.
It is .......... difficult to learn English without any dictionary.
The lead in petrol produces a ................... gas which is often collected in busy streets surrounded by high buildings.
The number of candidates in this interview .............. limited to ten.
Language is not necessarily the private property of those who use it, ..................... Russian is not private property of Russian people.
Although a number of boys and girls have given a great deal of thought to their future work, ................ just over one-third had a reasonable knowledge of the tasks.
"When did you go to work?"  "As soon as they came in, we ................... to work."
She has been to the cinema ................ of times.
"Did Susan have a chance to get in touch with you?" "Oh, yes, she .......... me up last night."
"Have you repaired the computer?" "Yes. I ................ it yesterday."
Here is the man............. my brother is going to .............
Would you mind ................ me a hand?
Barbara is accustomed to ................ ten hours a day.
